resources.string: Your opponent got the Power Bomb bonus !
Your opponent got the Move bonus!
Your opponent got the Replay bonus !
Your opponent used the Replay bonus
Do you feel the hard taste of DEFEAT ?
Happier and stronger than ever, you are the BOSS !
The BattleShip with pixels and colors inside
Tell me, what\'s your name ? Or lie, you can change later your name later if you want.
"You can only use one bonus at a time "
Place the blocks (with strategy and expertise)
You will run cowardly and the shame will be on your family for years and years ! You really want to give up ?

This bonus let you - I swear - to move all the blocks or rotate (space needed). Please note you can\'t place it on a case already played; so I advise you to find this bonus quickly (I don\'t do rules, I just write it).
This bonus let you - a totally crazy thing - to play again. But, if you miss. When you miss, you play again. And if you miss again, take your stuff and leave. Work in progress here.

This bonus let you - I swear - to move all the blocks or rotate (space needed). Please note you can\'t place it on a case already played; so I advise you to find this bonus quickly (I don\'t do rules, I just write it).
Right, I told you all I know, so get ready to destroy all those tetrominos ! Please note no ant was injured during the development of the game - even if my whip was closed.
How do we play ? Sit and read ..
The level Less Nice - Holidays are over
The level Nice - Slowly but not too much
Level Impossible - masochistic and Police only
Andy will be your lovely opponent : You will play against him.
The Level Nice is - as you know - mostly nice : everyone shots randomly and no one wins... Whatever, don\'t underestimate Andy ...
The Level Less Nice is - surprise, surprise - mostly less nice : Andy scratches is head before shotting and the defeat shouldn\'t be excluded ... Are you ready for the challenge ? \"

The Level Not Nice is - suspense, suspense - really not nice : Andy just got graduated in statistics and read your horoscope to know it all. Plus, he applies random colors on blocks before starting the game.
The Level Not Nice - Civilians, step back
3 Bonus are hidden on the map at strategic places. Shot the box with a bonus to get it, and push the button during your turn to use it. You can use it only once, think twice.
Challenge to your ego or injure to your intelligence ? Up to you - write 105 times the word challenge on your paper and discuss with your colleague until the end of the lesson.
The development team apologises to all the great fans of the fabulous ants. The last observation is not us, and I swear this creature really do have a place in our hearts.
Start to place your blocks on the grid - you can even rotate it by clicking on it. Then, try to destroy all the blocks of your opponent. if you hit a block, you play again.
